abstract: Jeroboam Bozeman has been enjoying breakout season with Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater cast as lead in several challenging roles; mute by choice during childhood, performer says dancing gave him back his voice and helped him become comfortable expressing himself.
lead_paragraph: Jeroboam Bozeman, who is having a breakout season with Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater, radiates both heat and inner calm, a far cry from his rough upbringing.

headline.main: An Ailey Dancer Finds the Voice He Lacked as a Boy
headline.print_headline: Dance Gave Him the Voice He Lacked

snippet: Jeroboam Bozeman, who is having a breakout season with Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater, radiates both heat and inner calm, a far cry from his rough upbringing.
